name: Un(family)ar
description:
Not feeling comfortable in your own home.
After a life changing Event, everything is confusing and random. Help our sick protagonist regain his lost memories every day, by exploring his maze-like house.
As he explores he finds various objects that slowly let him remember what his home was like.

Controls:

  • Movement - Arrow Keys/WASD
  • Interact/Pickup - Space/Enter

This game was made during a game jam (2 days). 

Global Game Jam 2019

After the jam we made a few improvements to get it closer to what we actually wanted it to be. This version can be downloaded below.

The source code can be found here: Github
